metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37328 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap overwrite in subtitle parsing

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-37328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-base-1.0 - 1.22.4-1
gstreamer1.0-alsa - 1.22.4-1
gstreamer1.0-gl - 1.22.4-1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-base - 1.22.4-1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-base-apps - 1.22.4-1
gstreamer1.0-x - 1.22.4-1
libgstreamer-gl1.0-0 - 1.22.4-1
libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-0 - 1.22.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base1.0 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.22.4-1').
